name: df-cad
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2
body: |- wb(wcad(w0, w1, w2), wo(wa(w0, w1), wa(w2, wxo(w0, w1))))
comment: Definition of the "carry" output of the full adder. It is true when at least two arguments are true, so it is equal to the "majority" function on three variables. See ~ cador and ~ cadan for alternate definitions. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Sep-2016.)
